entry.title: Product API v1.0.0
entry.summary: Product API v1.0.0 Scroll down for code samples, example requests and responses. Select a language for code samples from the tabs above or the mobile navigation menu. The Product API exposes catalog, products and prices information. Base URLs: https://test-api.finelab.io https://api.finelab.io Email: API support License: Apache 2.0 Authentication oAut...

entry.title: Product AsyncAPI 1.0.0 documentation
entry.summary: Product AsyncAPI 1.0.0 documentation Specification ID: finelab:sales:product License: Apache 2.0 Email support: api@finelab.io The Product AsyncAPI publishes events whenever changes occurs to catalogs, products or prices. Table of Contents Servers staging-broker Operations PUB sales.product.catalog PUB sales.product.information PUB sale...

entry.title: Order Service v1.0.0
entry.summary: The Order AsyncAPI subscibes on OrderPlacedEvent and publish OrderAsssessedEvent. entry.title: Catalog API v1.0.0
entry.summary: The Catalog API allows you recieve products from the finelab product catalog. Base URLs: http://localhost:8080 https://test-api.finelab.io Email: API support License: Apache 2.0 Authentication oAuth2 authentication. Flow: clientCredentials Token URL = https://finelab-test.eu.auth0.com/oauth/token ...

entry.title: Finelab Customer API
entry.summary: Welcome Hello and welcome! Diagram gantt title Adding GANTT diagram functionality to mermaid apple :a, 2017-07-20, 1w banana :crit, b, 2017-07-23, 1d cherry :active, c, after b a, 1d API Description one two bundle docker run \ -it \ --rm \ --volume="$PWD:/srv/jekyll" \ -p 4000:4000 jekyll/jekyll \ jekyll serve
